description:
Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more
- Register and get £3 includes sale
- Free limited-time delivery and free returns within 30 Days（*conditions apply）
- Daily flash sales on many items 

Wide selections
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections
- Browse by New Arrivals, Trends, Category, Best Sellers and more

Considerate services
- Get first access to sale alerts and promotional discounts
- Now accepting PayPal and major Credit Cards 
- Style now, pay later! Choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
- 24/7 Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/SHEINOFFICIAL/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sheinofficial/
Email: dispute@shein.com


The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Ishtari App on App Store

Product Features
  Ishtari, Lebanon's pioneering e-commerce platform, brings convenience and quality to your fingertips with its dedicated mobile application.
Streamlined Shopping Experience
  Enjoy a seamless browsing and purchasing journey with our intuitive interface, specifically optimized for mobile devices.
Be Notified of Exclusive Offers
  Never miss out on a deal again. Simply mark your favorite items with the heart icon, and we'll notify you of any price drops or special promotions.
Secure and Convenient Access
  Save time with our secure sign-in feature, offering facial or fingerprint recognition for hassle-free access to your account.
Customer Support during working hours
  Connect with our dedicated support team anytime, anywhere, via WhatsApp chat support, available during working hours to assist you with any inquiries or issues.
Effortless Product Discovery
  Not sure about a product's details? Utilize our scan feature to snap a picture, and we'll help you find the item you're looking for.

Product Description
  Discover, browse, and purchase from our extensive selection of products, ranging from home appliances to electronics, health and beauty essentials, apparel, and more. With delivery available all over Lebanon, enjoy swift shipping in as little as 3-5 days. Whether you're shopping for gifts, reading reviews, or tracking orders, Ishtari's mobile app ensures a superior shopping experience tailored to your needs.

Permissions Notice
 Please note that the Ishtari app may require access to certain services to function optimally:
 Camera: Enables the app to utilize your device's camera for product scanning, capturing images, or scanning barcodes.
 Location: Allows access to your location for discovering local offers and expedited address selection.
 Storage: Grants permission to store preferences for faster loading times and enhanced user experience.
 Wi-Fi: Utilized during setup of features such as Dash Button or Dash Wand for convenient shopping.
 Download the Ishtari App on the App Store today to elevate your online shopping experience.

OLX Lebanon (formerly dubizzle Lebanon) is your go-to app to buy, sell, or rent anything locally; easy, fast, secure and FREE.

Whether you're listing a car, renting out a property, upgrading your phone, or simply decluttering, OLX connects you with buyers and sellers across Lebanon in just a few taps.

Browse thousands of listings in 13 main categories and 60+ subcategories: from cars and electronics to fashion, furniture, services, and more.

Key Features:
• Post an ad in seconds
• Smart search filters (by category, price, and location)
• Secure in-app chat with buyers & sellers
• Manage your ads anytime: edit, delete, or repost
• Boost your listings for more visibility
• Discover local deals daily
• Clean, user-friendly interface

Popular Categories:
Cars & Vehicles: Buy/sell new or used cars, motorcycles & more
Real Estate: List or find properties for sale or rent across Lebanon
Electronics, Jobs, Fashion, Services, Baby Gear, and more

Join thousands already using Lebanon’s #1 marketplace to buy & sell safely and easily, all from your phone.

Download OLX Lebanon now for FREE and start buying & selling !

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Step into Idealz, where shopping is reimagined and every purchase opens the door to dreams becoming reality! Idealz is not just an online store; it's a revolutionary concept that has redefined the shopping experience as we know it.

At Idealz, we believe that shopping should not only be enjoyable but also rewarding. That’s why we’ve created a unique shop-and-win concept that gives our customers a chance to win exciting prizes with every purchase they make.

Here’s how it works: Shop ‘idealzbasics’ products and get free tickets into prize campaigns of your choice. Our prizes span across various categories; whether you’re dreaming of gold, cutting-edge electronics, sleek cars, or enhancing your lifestyle with premium experiences, Idealz has something for everyone. Once a specified number of tickets have been issued or a certain amount of time has elapsed, we conduct a regulated draw and announce a winner!

All our draws are done live and streamed on all social media platforms and winners are announced weekly!

In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Benefit from a whole range of perks that give you the freedom to search for anything you need in seconds. Want to be the first to see the latest collections, offers, and promotions in women’s clothing? Simply enable instant notifications and access the hottest releases in just one click! 
Also enjoy the shopping experience by downloading our App and benefit from our discount code “APPY” on your first purchase. Shop for what you love now by spreading out your payments with Tabby which is 0% off interest or fees in UAE and Kuwait.

Don't forget to choose your location upon downloading the app to get a more personalized online shopping experience!

We know what it's like to wait for your order, which is why we offer fast delivery with every purchase! And since we're so committed to ensuring you can enjoy your products in record time, you can easily track your order by entering your order number and email address.




      •   Free Returns



Need to return something? No problem! Simply take advantage of our 30-day free returns policy! Register your return online and our courier will pick it up for you. Who knew online shopping could be so simple?

Welcome to Yubai – Your Unified Shopping Experience!

Tired of switching between apps to find the perfect look? Yubai brings the best of fashion, beauty, and wellness directly to you. We've partnered with industry leaders Amazon and Sephora to give you a single platform for all your shopping needs.

What You'll Love About Yubai:

Shop Amazon & Sephora: Browse millions of products from two of the world's biggest retailers without leaving the app. From the latest fashion trends on Amazon to exclusive beauty finds from Sephora, Yubai has it all.

Curated Collections: Discover personalized recommendations and expertly curated lists. Whether you're looking for sustainable fashion, trending skincare, or the latest tech gadgets, we'll help you find it.

Seamless Experience: Enjoy a smooth, intuitive interface designed for effortless shopping. Search, filter, and compare products with ease.

Stay Updated: Get notified about exclusive deals, new arrivals, and special promotions from both Amazon and Sephora.

developer: DSM Grup Danismanlik Iletisim ve Satis Tic. A.S.
description:
Welcome to your ultimate shopping destination where everything you need, from fashion and beauty to home essentials and more, comes together in one place. Enjoy amazing deals, top brands, the latest trends, and so much more!

WELCOME DISCOUNT

First impressions matter, right? That’s why we’ve got an exclusive discount code waiting for you on your first order. Just download Trendyol and claim your welcome treat."

MORE ABOUT THE APP

Trendyol is your go-to shopping platform, making shopping easy and seamless. As you swipe through thousands of global, local and Turkish brands and millions of products, you’ll find a new trend waiting at every scroll. Planning outfits? Tracking orders? Enjoying free returns? It’s all a breeze. Here’s a tip: mark your faves and we’ll let you know when the prices drop. Download the Trendyol app today and start exploring!"

MORE ABOUT TRENDYOL

With our wide selection of clothing, footwear, accessories, home essentials, beauty must-haves, electronics, and more, Trendyol transforms shopping into an experience that’s accessible and budget-friendly. Trendyol Collection translates the latest runway trends into wearable outfits for every style, occasion and budget. Our lines range from a glamorous party selection (Trendyol Party) and a casual jeans collection (Trendyol Denim) to modest fashion looks (Trendyol Modest) and a plus-size collection (Trendyol Curve)."

Now it’s your turn to embrace your unique style from casual and relaxed to elegant and stylish with on-trend fashion pieces for women, men, and kids from Trendyol Collection. Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

Are you always searching for the latest trends? Do you love discovering new outfits? 
Do you always go for looks that are a hit wherever you go? Then this is the place for you! 

Download the Bershka app now and discover a new way of buying clothes and fashion online, view fashion items on a daily basis, see the latest trends for him and for her, manage your account and find the nearest stores.


THE COMPLETE BERSHKA CATALOGUE IS WITHIN REACH 


With the Bershka app, you will get access to the online store and can buy clothes in the most comfortable way, get the latest news, the latest fashion trends and items, women’s clothing (dresses, coats, shirts, skirts, blouses, boots…) men’s clothing (trousers, shirts, jackets, t-shirts, shoes…) and accessories (bags, purses, jewellery, belts…) as well as beauty and make-up. 

CREATE A WISH LIST WITH ALL THE ITEMS YOU LOVE 

You can do more than just buy clothes. You can also look at the complete catalogue, select the items that you like the most, choose complete outfits, and make a list of the latest trends for your next shopping trip - choose what you love best! 

MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNT 

With the app, you can do more than just buy clothes. 
You can also manage your orders, keep track of your online purchases, contact the customer service team if you have any questions and recommend the app to your friends. 

DISCOVER THE STORES CLOSEST TO YOU 

Thanks to geolocation, the app can tell you where the nearest store is and whether the store sells womenswear, menswear or both, and also provides you with a contact number for the store in case you want to order a specific item. You can also save your favourite items to a list and access them immediately if necessary.


EVERYTHING YOU CAN DO WITH THE BERSHKA APP

√ Discover the latest fashion trends
With the app, you can quickly see which clothes will be in fashion each season.
√ Buy all the catalogue items 
Choose the clothes you love and buy them! You only have to choose your payment method, enter the delivery address and wait for your order to arrive as quickly as possible.
√ Create a wish list with the items you love the most 
You can find out which clothes and accessories are on-trend and you can also save the items you like the most to a wish list. You can add items for women and men in the app with a QR code or with a scanner. 
√ Manage your account 
Via your user account, you can review your purchases, track your orders and contact the customer service department with any questions you may have.
√Find new places to shop
The app shows you a list of the nearest stores. You can also see their location on the map and add them to your favourites list or view their details (contact phone number, if they sell womenswear, menswear or both, and the exact address)


Do you like to dress in the latest fashion? Do you like to buy clothes, shoes and accessories for women and men directly from your mobile? Do you want to see all the orders you have placed? Do you want to discover new stores? In that case, the Bershka app is exactly what you have been looking for. 

It’s much more than an online store.

Shop bestselling beauty favorites on LooliaCloset from makeup and skincare, to haircare and fragrances, all from the brands you love. Order everyday essentials and top trending products and enjoy a seamless shopping experience on-the-go, with easy checkout and secure payment options.

SohatiCare is an online parapharmacy platform launched by Sohati.com. The e-commerce platform offers a range of dermo-cosmetic, personal care, beauty and wellness products. All SohatiCare products are certified and are shipped from accredited distributors. SohatiCare does not offer any pharmaceutical product or drug, classified as such by the Ministry of Health of the Country.

SohatiCare allows you to shop on a 24/7 basis while also offering the advice of an accredited expert, available through online chat or call.The products are delivered to your doorstep within a maximum of 72 hours from the date of the order.  Delivery is available for free in Lebanon. Delivery options for other countries are available depending on the size of the order.

developer: Noon E Commerce Owned by Noon AD Holdings One Person Company LLC
description:
Welcome to noon - the best shopping app in UAE, Saudi Arabia and Egypt. From mobiles to home appliances, beauty, fashion, electronics, everyday grocery essentials, fast food delivery, and more, noon is the best online shopping app for all your shopping needs.

MOBILES, BEAUTY, HOME, FURNITURE, FASHION, BABY PRODUCTS, GIFTS & MORE

Browse our online shopping app to find a huge range of fashion essentials in our online clothing store, along with footwear, accessories like bags and luggage, and more. Enjoy the best mobile phones online shopping with phones to suit your budget. Look your best with a range of beauty must-haves. Browse our baby shopping store online to find a range of toys & products for your little one. Update your space with our online furniture store app. Find the perfect Ramadan gifts for loved ones. 

SHOP TOP BRANDS

Shop laptops, computers and accessories from Apple Macbook Pro and Air, HP, Lenovo, Dell, and Asus; mobile phones and accessories from Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, Realme, and OnePlus; audio video products from Samsung, LG, Hisense, and TCL;  headsets and headphones from Apple, JBL, Sony, and Soundcore; video game consoles and accessories from Sony, Nintendo, Asus, Logitech, and Microsoft; wearables from Apple, Samsung and Huawei; home appliances and homeware from NKX, Fashion Home, Home Box, Arabest, Syngenta, Geepas, Black + Decker, Samsung, and Nikai; apparel from Adidas, Nike and Meishida; eyewear and watches for men and women from Casio, Fossil, Tommy Hilfiger, RayBan, and Lacoste; and beauty and haircare from Maybelline New York, L'Oreal, La Roche Posay, Garnier, and Cerave.

AUTHENTIC BRANDS, INSTANT RETURNS & 2X REFUNDS WITH NOON SUPERMALL

Shop a huge range of branded products with supermall. supermall offers products from premium authentic brands, scheduled fast returns and 2x refund. Get delivery in just 60 minutes and enjoy the best customer experience with supermall.

ORDER FOOD ONLINE WITH NOON FOOD

No time to go to the restaurant? Looking for fast food delivery? Order food online and get instant delivery with the noon food ordering app. Our online food delivery app is fast and easy to use. Enjoy your favourite dishes with instant delivery from 10,000+ restaurants, 100+ cuisines with exciting discounts.
  
GET FAST DELIVERY WITH NOON MINUTES & NOON NOWNOW

Stock your pantry and order fresh groceries online. Our fast grocery delivery app NowNow offers products from supermarkets and pharmacies like Spinneys, VIVA Supermarket, Choithrams, Aster Pharmacy and others. Enjoy instant delivery to make grocery online shopping fast and simple. Choose Express delivery for fast delivery at noon or shop with noon supermall for instant delivery, 2x refunds, easy returns and products from authentic brands.

UNLIMITED FREE DELIVERY & EXCLUSIVE DEALS WITH NOON ONE

Get unlimited free delivery on noon, instant delivery on noon Food and noon NowNow, exclusive deals, and more at just 25 AED per month. Get fast, free next-day delivery through express and fast delivery services with no minimum orders and fast and free same-day delivery on all orders over 100 AED. 

EXCLUSIVE DEALS & COUPONS

Enjoy online deals, offers, vouchers, promo codes and other ways to save when shopping at the noon online shopping store. Save with 11.11 sales, Yellow Friday deals, Ramadan specials, daily deals on fresh groceries and more.

WORLD-CLASS SHOPPING EXPERIENCE

Get instant access to our deals and discount shopping store. Enjoy free and fast delivery, exclusive deals, discounts, coupon codes and more. Save products to your wishlist and enjoy other in-app features. Shop authentic branded products with noon supermall.

MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS 

Pay with cash on delivery, credit or debit cards, or choose split payments over 4–12 months with Tabby and Tamara’s Buy Now, Pay Later plans. Enjoy peace of mind with our No-Cost EMI and 15-day return policy.

Download the best online shopping app now.

Discover our App for a complete experience: explore new items, add your favorite garments, enjoy the best looks, and shop with just one click.

Stradivarius is the online women's clothing store you've been searching for. A brand that adapts to current fashion trends. All the summer, spring, winter, and autumn trends at your fingertips. Welcome to the Stradivarius App.

With the Stradivarius app, you will receive the most anticipated notifications so you can stay trendy and not miss the garment of the moment. We have different types of sections: New Collection, Clothing, STR Teen, Shoes, Accessories, and much more.

STRADIVARIUS, the online clothing store for women. All the benefits of our app include:

  - STORE LOCATOR: Find all the outfits and best looks at your nearest store by activating geolocation on your device. Are you ready to go shopping at your nearest store? Remember, if you prefer, you can always shop directly in our online stores or from the Stradivarius app.

  - QR CODE AND VOICE SEARCH: Scan the QR code on the tag of the look you are searching for or use voice search to find the perfect outfit.

Whether you’re shopping schoolwear for the new term, hunting for the perfect outfit for a special occasion or deciding how to switch up your living room, there’s something for everyone. And with 1000s of products across fashion, home and beauty. We truly mean it. 

THE ULTIMATE STYLE DESTINATION

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Be the very first to know about new brand arrivals, upcoming sales, limited-time offers and items now back in stock with push notifications directly to your mobile device. 

TRACK EVERY ORDER 
Our Order Tracking function will make sure you know where your order is from the moment it leaves our warehouse to the second it’s delivered to your local store or direct to your front door, with detailed information on what you’ll be expecting, and when. 

FAVOURITES
Save your favourites at the click of a button – and all in one place – with our one-tap heart feature. Keep track of your saved styles, add or remove them from your list, and check if your size is in stock.

ORDER AND PAY, YOUR WAY (24.9% Representative APR Variable.)
Place an order and spread the cost with your Nextpay Credit Account via the Next app, then manage your balance, make payments and view statements wherever (and whenever) you want. If you’re in one of our stores, just scan your digital card to pay for your shopping with Nextpay.* 

Credit subject to status. *An in-app nextpay card to shop in-store is only available to customers once a first statement has been issued and a subsequent payment has been made.

We want to hear from you

The Spinneys mobile app offers you over 9,000 items for you to easily browse and shop from. You can now get your groceries done at ease from the palm of your hand and have them delivered straight to your door.

• Browse Category Aisles

Search through the categories and shop from our wide selection of fresh produce, meat, seafood, frozen products, snacks, home essentials and much more. 

• Collect Points & Get Rewarded

Everything you spend online will be rewarded with Spinneys loyalty point and you can redeem them at any of our branches or online at your own convenience. 

• Ongoing Promotions

Find all the latest promotions available directly on our mobile app. Cashback is applicable online and in all our branches!  

• Freshness guaranteed 

All our groceries are delivered in refrigerated trucks! 

• Multiple Payment Methods

Pay by cash on delivery, credit card on delivery or online via our secure payment gateway. 

• Delivery 7 Days a week

Pick the date and time slot that is most convenient, and your order will be delivered to your doorstep then! 

• Save your Favorites & Lists

Order your most loved products! Create and manage your own shipping lists (Favorites, Mexican Night, Laundry essentials…) for faster shopping. 

• Shop by Your Diet & Lifestyle

Filter and sort products that fit your diet and lifestyle, including ketogenic, gluten-free and vegan, among others. No Matter your diet preference, we’ve got you covered with wide selection of organics and hard-to-find specialties. 

• Shop by Brand

Shop over 1,000 brands from local favorites to exclusive imports. You can also find a dedicated page with brand details and products. 

• Scan Barcodes

Use the barcode scanner to quickly access a product page, check prices and add items to your list or cart.

For more information, please visit: Spinneyslebanon.com
